channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Immigration enforcement grants total $14M in Floridastate
item.description: Florida's State Board of Immigration Enforcement has approved reimbursing local law enforcement millions of dollars for immigration enforcement efforts.

item.title: DeSantis, Cabinet OK $83 million land buy from GOP donorstate
item.description: Gov. Ron DeSantis and the Florida Cabinet on Sept. 30 agreed to pay $83.3 million for four acres of land in Destin, a Panhandle beach town – 10 times the price that the owner, a major Republican donor, paid for it.

item.title: Trooper's Law: New Florida law punishes animal neglect in disastersstate
item.description: Anew Florida law, which takes effect Oct. 1, was inspired by the heartbreaking story of a dog that was tied up and abandoned along a Florida interstate during Hurricane Milton.

item.title: Manatee County deputies arrest Hillsborough deputy on DUI chargelocal
item.description: A Hillsborough County Sheriff’s Office detention deputywas arrested over the weekendin Manatee Countyon suspicion of driving under the influence.

item.title: Want to stream Demon Slayer movie? You might be waiting a whilenews
item.description: "Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle"is one of themost successful movies of the year, and it's still going.

item.title: Police say local woman’s death was homicide, not accidentlocal
item.description: Bradenton police are investigating a homicide after awoman was found dead Sept. 28in the 2100 block of 8th Avenue East.

item.title: Bradenton Beach City Attorney retires amid corruption lawsuitManatee
item.description: Bradenton Beach City Attorney Ricinda Perry retired on Sept. 18 after 21 years of service following involvement ina lawsuit alleging corruptionand other controversies during the 2024 hurricane season.

item.title: Sarasota Yacht Club sailing director wins F18 North American titlelocal
item.description: Dalton Tebo and John Casey spent four days sailing an 18-foot catamaran named El Cucuy around Newport, Rhode Island, at the end of August.

item.title: 14 local restaurants get high-priority violations, 20 ace inspectionsdining
item.description: Ourdigital databaseof restaurant health inspections is updated regularly with the latest information on which Sarasota, Bradenton and Venice area restaurants passed or failed.

item.title: Sarasota County OKs $2.52B budget with stormwater, sheriff boostssarasota
item.description: Sarasota County Commissioners have approved a $2.52 billion total budget, a 73% increase in spending from just three years ago, asproperty tax revenueshave soared.

item.title: Beach-themed adventure park opens in Sarasota County with giant slidesentertainment
item.description: When Sarasota’s rainy season hits or a cold snap rolls through, families may be forced to cut back on theirbeach time. But a beachy new adventure park that just opened its doors in North Port is saving the day.

item.title: Will government shutdown delay flights at Sarasota Bradenton airport?sarasota
item.description: If a spending package is not approved by congressional lawmakers for the new fiscal year — which starts at midnight Oct. 1 — a federalgovernment shutdownmay occur. Depending on the duration, theSarasota Bradenton International Airportcould feel the effects with longer lines and cancelled flights.

item.title: Out of all Sarasota legends, here's why I want to meet Stephen King
Holidays arrive in Sarasota with Publix limited-edition ice cream
item.description: It may still feel like summer in Sarasota, where highs can flirt with 90 even as the calendar says fall, butPublix has already turned its attention to the holiday season.

item.title: Did a 'world famous' Sarasota restaurant close? Here's what we know
item.description: A Sarasota restaurant and tiki bar billed as “world-famous” and known for its stoner-friendly vibe and menu — featuring items like the Dankalicious Nugz, Legal Greens, and the Wake & Bake brunch special — along with a memorable national television appearance, has apparentlyclosed.
